expr
Class Variable

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--expr.Variable
public class Variable
extends java.lang.Object
implements Expr

This class represents a variable in an expression. A variable holds its current value under the assumption (Flyweight pattern) that all occurrences of a same variable are shared. This is a crucial assumption for interpreting the statements that host a variable.
